snippet: The charges and heavy punishment for Aleksei Navalny were a retaliation for his campaign against President Vladimir Putin’s corrupt political machine.
abstract: Editorial deplores Russian court decision that sentenced opposition leader Aleksei Navalny to five years in prison; says charges and heavy punishment, which are retaliation for his campaign against Vladimir V Putin's corrupt political machine, are latest sign of the corruption, intolerance and absence of rule of law that has come to define Putin's Russia.
lead_paragraph: The charges and heavy punishment for Aleksei Navalny were a retaliation for his campaign against President Vladimir Putin’s corrupt political machine.

headline.main: Mr. Putin Tries to Crush Another Rival
headline.print_headline: Mr. Putin Tries to Crush Another Rival
